Cosm makes the world more connected.

The Internet of Things is happening, and it’s being built right here on Cosm. Our mission is to make the Internet of Things not only easier and more accessible, but more engaging and meaningful. Cosm is where the whole world of devices, developers, apps, and commercial applications come together. We believe this convergence will revolutionise how we view and interact with the world and the very fabric of our culture. Cosm was founded as Pachube in 2008 and has grown under the vision that open is better than closed and sharing is better than hoarding.

  • Our Service

    Cosm allows developers and enthusiasts to connect devices, build apps and explore data to transform things and their environments into smarter and more powerful worlds. For more information, see How It Works.

  • Our Community

    Cosm has a unique community of developers, makers, innovators, builders, enthusiasts and commercial prototypers who find common ground in working on diverse projects. They are initiating crowdsourcing movements, building new sensors and devices to gather data previously unavailable, and writing thousands of custom applications to make sense of it all.

  • Our Commercial Side

    Web and mobile developers are using Cosm's API to embed connections to the physical world within their applications. Hardware manufacturers are leveraging Cosm using our On Board hosted device-provisioning and web-registration service to quickly build and control connected services and provide their customers with access to the data that makes their products more valuable. Cosm further provides businesses with access to a large, engaged community of users who are hungry for products they can use to make sense of the world.
